Remove likely multi-nucleotide mutation events Function that removes DNP that are actually labeled as single nucleotide variants.

Source: R/DNP_TNP_remover.R
DNP_TNP_remover.Rd

Remove likely multi-nucleotide mutation events

Function that removes DNP that are actually labeled as single nucleotide variants.

DNP_TNP_remover(MAF, delete_recur = F)

Arguments

MAF

MAF file, with relevant fields consisten with the GDC MAF specification (https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/File_Formats/MAF_Format/).
delete_recur

T/F statement about whether to remove recurrent (02) tumors.

Contents
